*Component items*:
  * *Mindcover - cranial meninges (cranial-meninges)*: primary function of the meninges and of the cerebrospinal fluid is to protect the central nervous system
  * *Mindcover - arterial vasoconstrictors (arterial-vasoconstrictors)*: increase in systemic blood pressure
  * *Mindcover - tentorium cerebelli dura mater visceral receptors (tentorium-cerebelli-dura-matter)*: visceral sensation of tentorium cerebelli and supratentorial falx cerebri
  * *Mindcover - wall of brachial artery (brachial-artery-vasoconstrictors)*: increase in systemic blood pressure
  * *Mindcover - arm blood vessels (arm-blood-vessels)*: constrict vessels resulting in poor circulation to limb
  * *Mindcover - forearm blood vessels (forearm-blood-vessels)*: vasomotor forearm sympathetic fibers
  * *Mindcover - stomach blood vessels (stomach-blood-vessels)*: vasomotor stomach sympathetic fibers
  * *Mindcover - liver blood vessels (liver-blood-vessels)*: vasomotor liver sympathetic fibers
